name: FILM 120
title: Introduction to Media Theory
description: Explores media theory. May be organized thematically or chronologically. Selects from key debates and movements central to understanding media forms in relation to self, society, politics, and aesthetics.

conditions.restricted_to_majors: proposed and declared film and digital media majors.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): FILM 20A. Enrollment is restricted to proposed and declared film and digital media majors.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated discussion section
